name: Mad Runner
description:
The world is flooded.
You must escape safely without drowning.
Mad Runner is a difficult game full of excitement.
Unusual obstacles are applied to each stage under its own theme throughout various stages.
All you have to believe is your sense! Enjoy the high-level run game!

Various themes and obstacles applied to each stage
Animation of unique characters. Simple game rules.
Find a hidden path and earn items.

1 player
250MB minimum save size
